/** @mainpage About libSBML and its use

@htmlinclude libsbml-authors.html

<p>
This manual describes the Octave application programming interface (API) of
libSBML, an open-source (LGPL) library for writing and manipulating the
Systems Biology Markup Language (SBML).
@htmlinclude libsbml-blurb.html

@htmlinclude force-serif-font-on.html
@htmlinclude doxygen-regular-text-start.html

<h2>Other topics</h2>

- @subpage libsbml-communications

@htmlinclude force-serif-font-off.html
